extension.description: Install Languages with fonts
More frequently used fonts, which Kodi cannot yet add to a language addon.

extension.summary: Mostly unused fonts in the world
extension.description: This addon contains some font files, which bring formats that are largely unused, ancient and not widely used languages for example.
These written languages are still used in the world, but are used relatively little.
Afrikaans version of all texts used in Kodi.
Amharic version of all texts used in Kodi.
Arabic version of all texts used in Kodi.
